topic.title: Concept: What Is the for Dental Grading?

body.p: DT-PrepScanner Logo A faster, smarter way to grade tooth preps, the for Dental Grading streamlines dental education with efficient and accurate grading. It helps instructors and students evaluate dental work with accuracy and ease, replacing manual grading with digital tools that save time and improve feedback.

ul.li: Advanced Technology: Robotic precision and laser sensing for accurate assessments.
Visual Insights: 2D and 3D visualizations of dental preparations.

Integrated Tools:
Preloaded rubrics for consistent evaluation.
Self-assessment features for student learning.
Course Compatibility: Supports a range of dental courses, including operative and esthetic procedures.

Benefits:
Simplifies grading for instructors.
Helps students understand and improve their work.
